attributes.action: Hold all children in education back a year from nursery to university
attributes.additional_details: I think all kids in education should be held back a year in school so no child moves from their Current class and they all go back in September 2021 to resit the year. I think the only new intake for 2021 should be nursery children creating a nursery’s class 1 and 2 for the new intakes and the kids being held back a year. I have a child who got predicted grades in 2020 at school and now will have predicted grades at college for some kids it’s 2years of predicted grades (let’s help our children )
attributes.background: Due to covid education for children has been so hard and having predicted grades has caused so much confusion for young people it would be nice to see positive change and think about holding all children in education back a year please

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
